ValidationRule.description: Requires leads to have the Department field populated before the status can be set to Qualifying
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualifying"), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, NOT($Setup.BypassRules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c), OR(ISPICKVAL( Department__c , "Unknown"), ISBLANK(TEXT(Department__c)) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Department can't be "Unknown" or blank to save the lead with a Status as Qualifying.
